description: Twenty residents from Abbotswood Nursing Home died with coronavirus and its licence was suspended.
title: Coronavirus: Abbotswood Nursing Home investigation referred to police
title_page: Coronavirus: Abbotswood Nursing Home investigation referred to police - BBC News
maintext: The Department of Health and Social Care stepped in to run the home in Ballasalla on 13 April after an outbreak of the virus and residents were moved out the following month.
